description: This file defines a PHP trait 'BookingUtils' that provides utility methods for generating SMS messages related to event bookings, including confirmation and verification messages, as well as generating unique booking IDs.

classes.name: BookingUtils
classes.description: A PHP trait providing utility functions for booking-related SMS generation and ID creation.

methods.name: generateOrderConfirmationSMS
methods.description: Generates a URL-encoded SMS text for booking confirmation, including event name, booking ID, and a link to download the e-ticket.

methods.name: generateOrderVerificationSMS
methods.description: Generates a URL-encoded SMS text for verifying ticket redemption, including event name and booking ID.

methods.name: generateOrderId
methods.description: Creates a unique booking ID based on event name, with options for sub-orders and invitations.
